info.title: Copying files and directories with &rsync; locally

abstract.para: You can copy files within the same machine using &rsync;.

info.note: Ensure that you have write access to the destination location.

topic.para: To copy file to the location /var/backup, use the following command: rsync -avz backup.tar.xz /var/backup/
The file backup.tar.xz is copied to /var/backup/; the absolute path will be /var/backup/backup.tar.xz.
